name: Pandora's Box
source: Abyss store OR using Orange Relic Fragment with probability to synthesis it. Not included in relic summoning pool.
introduction: Even though humans know what dangers lie ahead, they still can't retain their desires, hence a lot of suffering in the wake of opening Pandora's Boxes. Humans are still opening Pandora's Boxes one after another. But never forget the last hope hidden in Pandora's Boxes.
